title: Development Process of Game-Based Metacognitive Strategies for Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Blended learning utilizing VR simulations and mobile game platforms in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and apply three or more metacognitive monitoring strategies in game-based learning environments.
Learners can evaluate and adjust their cognitive strategies in the scientific problem-solving process through VR simulations.
Learners can write reflective journals using in-game feedback systems and improve learning outcomes by over 20%.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
